title: Can't use Pbe
body: I had a pbe account but because of the internet at the time then my computer breaking for a while I never got to use it or make it, is there any way I can still use it or will I never even get a chance because I never used it when I signed up. Thanks if you can help I tried some stuff and I don't know what to do.

replies.body:
You can actually view your PBE signup status by visiting [**this page**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe), just be sure that you're logged into the specific account you want to check!

For more info on the PBE, check out our super-neat [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) we did on it. Let me know if you have any questions!
